original_text: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
korean_text: 그러면 사람으로부터라 할까 하였으나 모든 사람이 요한을 참 선지자로 여기므로 그들이 백성을 두려워하는지라

sentences.original_text: But if we shall say, Of men;
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 우리가 사람의 것이라 말하면

sentences.original_text: that he was a prophet indeed.
